00082 LinearRegression::LinearRegression( )
00083 {
00084         //
00085         // the following initialization is not really necessary since
00086         // all comparision use sxM.nelem( ) instead of sxM.dim( 0 )
00087         //
00088         syM.resize( 0U );
00089         sxM.resize( 0U );
00090 
00091         reset( );
00092 }

00114 //===========================================================================
00130 void LinearRegression::reset( )
00131 {
00132         modifiedM = true;
00133         countM    = 0;
00134         syM       = 0.;
00135         sxM       = 0.;
00136         rxxM      = 0.;
00137         rxyM      = 0.;
00138 }

00141 //===========================================================================
00168 void LinearRegression::update( )
00169 {
00170     if( modifiedM && sxM.nelem( ) > 0 && countM > 0 )
00171         {
00172             unsigned i, j;
00173                 double   s, t;
00174 
00175         s = countM;
00176 
00177                 Array  < double > dvecL( sxM.dim( 0 ) );
00178                 Array  < double > mxL  ( sxM / s );
00179                 Array  < double > myL  ( syM / s );
00180                 Array2D< double > cxxL ( sxM.dim( 0 ), sxM.dim( 0 ) );
00181                 Array2D< double > cxyL ( sxM.dim( 0 ), syM.dim( 0 ) );
00182 
00183         for( i = 0; i < sxM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00184                 {
00185             t = mxL( i );
00186 
00187             for( j = 0; j <= i; j++ )
00188                         {
00189                 cxxL( i, j ) = rxxM( i, j ) / s - t * mxL( j );
00190                         }
00191 
00192             for( j = 0; j < syM.dim( 0 ); ++j )
00193                         {
00194                 cxyL( i, j ) = rxyM( i, j ) / s - t * myL( j );
00195                         }
00196         }
00197 
00198         linearRegress( cxxL, cxyL, mxL, myL, amatM, bvecM, dvecL );
00199 
00200         modifiedM = false;
00201     }
00202 }

00205 //===========================================================================
00244 void LinearRegression::train
00245 (
00246         const Array< double >& x,
00247         const Array< double >& y
00248 )
00249 {
00250         SIZE_CHECK
00251         (
00252                 ( x.ndim( ) == 1 && y.ndim( ) == 1 ) ||
00253                 ( x.ndim( ) == 2 && y.ndim( ) == 2 )
00254         )
00255 
00256     if( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00257         {
00258                 SIZE_CHECK( x.dim( 0 ) == y.dim( 0 ) )
00259 
00260         for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00261                 {
00262                         train( x[ i ], y[ i ] );
00263                 }
00264     }
00265         else
00266         {
00267                 if( sxM.nelem( ) != x.dim( 0 ) || syM.nelem( ) != y.dim( 0 ) )
00268                 {
00269                         if( countM > 0 )
00270                         {
00271                                 throw 1;
00272                         }
00273                         else
00274                         {
00275 
00276                                 sxM  .resize( x.dim( 0 ) );
00277                                 syM  .resize( y.dim( 0 ) );
00278                                 rxxM .resize( x.dim( 0 ), x.dim( 0 ) );
00279                                 rxyM .resize( x.dim( 0 ), y.dim( 0 ) );
00280                                 amatM.resize( y.dim( 0 ), x.dim( 0 ) );
00281                                 bvecM.resize( y.dim( 0 ) );
00282 
00283                                 sxM  = 0.;
00284                                 syM  = 0.;
00285                                 rxxM = 0.;
00286                                 rxyM = 0.;
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289 
00290                 //
00291                 // train linear regression model
00292                 //
00293                 ++countM;
00294 
00295                 syM += y;
00296 
00297                 for( unsigned i = 0, j; i < sxM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00298                 {
00299                         double t  = x( i );
00300                         sxM( i ) += t;
00301 
00302                         for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00303                         {
00304                                 rxxM( i, j ) += t * x( j );
00305                         }
00306 
00307                         for( j = 0; j < syM.dim( 0 ); ++j )
00308                         {
00309                                 rxyM( i, j ) += t * y( j );
00310                         }
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 modifiedM = true;
00314         }
00315 }

00319 //===========================================================================
00360 void LinearRegression::remove
00361 (
00362         const Array< double >& x,
00363         const Array< double >& y
00364 )
00365 {
00366         SIZE_CHECK
00367         (
00368                 ( x.ndim( ) == 1 && y.ndim( ) == 1 ) ||
00369                 ( x.ndim( ) == 2 && y.ndim( ) == 2 )
00370         )
00371 
00372     if( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00373         {
00374                 SIZE_CHECK( x.dim( 0 ) == y.dim( 0 ) )
00375 
00376         for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00377                 {
00378                         remove( x[ i ], y[ i ] );
00379                 }
00380     }
00381         else
00382         {
00383                 SIZE_CHECK
00384                 (
00385                         countM > 0 &&
00386                         sxM.dim( 0 ) == x.dim( 0 ) &&
00387                         syM.dim( 0 ) == y.dim( 0 )
00388                 )
00389 
00390                 //
00391                 // remove vector from linear regression model
00392                 //
00393                 --countM;
00394 
00395                 syM -= y;
00396 
00397                 for( unsigned i = 0, j; i < sxM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00398                 {
00399                         double t  = x( i );
00400                         sxM( i ) -= t;
00401 
00402                         for( j = 0; j <= i; ++j )
00403                         {
00404                                 rxxM( i, j ) -= t * x( j );
00405                         }
00406 
00407                         for( j = 0; j < syM.dim( 0 ); ++j )
00408                         {
00409                                 rxyM( i, j ) -= t * y( j );
00410                         }
00411                 }
00412 
00413                 modifiedM = true;
00414         }
00415 }

00418 //===========================================================================
00449 void LinearRegression::recall
00450 (
00451         const Array< double >& x,
00452         Array< double >& y
00453 )
00454 {
00455         SIZE_CHECK( x.ndim( ) == 1 || x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00456     SIZE_CHECK( sxM.nelem( ) > 0 && countM > 0 )
00457 
00458     if( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00459         {
00460                 y.resize( x.dim( 0 ), syM.dim( 0 ) );
00461 
00462                 for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00463                 {
00464                         ArrayReference< double > yi;
00465                         yi.copyReference( y[ i ] );
00466                         recall( x[ i ], static_cast< Array< double >& >( yi ) );
00467                 }
00468     }
00469         else
00470         {
00471                 update( );
00472 
00473                 y.resize( syM.dim( 0 ) );
00474 
00475         for( unsigned i = 0; i < syM.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00476                 {
00477             double t = bvecM( i );
00478 
00479             for( unsigned j = 0; j < sxM.dim( 0 ); ++j )
00480                         {
00481                 t += amatM( i, j ) * x( j );
00482                         }
00483 
00484             y( i ) = t;
00485         }
00486         }
00487 }

00490 //===========================================================================
00527 void LinearRegression::leaveOneOut
00528 (
00529         const Array< double >& x,
00530         const Array< double >& y,
00531         Array< double >&       yout
00532 )
00533 {
00534         SIZE_CHECK
00535         (
00536                 ( x.ndim( ) == 1 && y.ndim( ) == 1 ) ||
00537                 ( x.ndim( ) == 2 && y.ndim( ) == 2 )
00538         )
00539 
00540     SIZE_CHECK( sxM.nelem( ) > 0 && countM > 0 )
00541 
00542     if( x.ndim( ) == 2 )
00543         {
00544                 SIZE_CHECK( x.dim( 0 ) == y.dim( 0 ) )
00545 
00546                 yout.resize( y );
00547 
00548                 for( unsigned i = 0; i < x.dim( 0 ); ++i )
00549                 {
00550                         ArrayReference< double > youti;
00551                         youti.copyReference( yout[ i ] );
00552                         leaveOneOut( x[ i ], y[ i ], static_cast< Array< double >& >( youti ) );
00553                 }
00554     }
00555         else
00556         {
00557                 remove( x, y );
00558                 recall( x, yout );
00559                 train( x, y );
00560         }
00561 }

00583 Array< double > LinearRegression::A( )
00584 {
00585         update( );
00586         return amatM;
00587 }

00609 Array< double > LinearRegression::b( )

00612         return bvecM;
